channel.title: LibreNMS Notifications
channel.description: RSS feed for notifications to LibreNMS users

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is the first notification. We will post these whenever an upcoming major change is about to happen.

item.title: Cisco syslog parsing changes
item.description: We have overhauled the Cisco syslog parsing. Please monitor your syslog entries from Cisco IOS, IOSXR, and CatOS devices. If you notice any issues please open a new issue on GitHub and include the original syslog message.

item.title: Billing Data Changes
item.description: We have updated the method for storing billing data, removing a lot of information stored in the database which was not used. Please check that your billing data is updating as expected, and if you notice any problems open an issue on GitHub.

item.title: Introduction of default purge interval or alert history
item.description: We have introduced a purge setting for alert history which is set to 365 days as default. If you would like to update this then please set $config['alert_log_purge'] to a custom value (set in days).

item.title: The Alerts Menu has moved
item.description: The Alerts menu has been relocated to a top level menu on the far right. To make room for this, Plugins have been moved to the overview menu.

item.title: Wireless Section in Beta
item.description: The new wireless section is under development. Please visit our community to discuss these changes and help improve LibreNMS. https://t.libren.ms/5fglp

item.title: Update to alerting to normal users
item.description: We have released an update to fix normal users receiving alerts with no ability to turn this off. An option is now available within the General alert settings section to enable this. Please note that the default is off to match with the other default contact settings. If you expect normal users to receive alerts then you should enable this new option.
